overview:
Our History Since the opening of our first Pulse & Cocktails store in Rotherham in 1997, we have rapidly expanded to create another 23 stores.

Our Concept Pulse & Cocktails are Europe’s Largest Sexy Superstores and Online Retailer. We have pioneered the modern day sex shop to create a welcoming and acceptable environment for couples to shop together. Goodbye seedy sex shops with your blacked out windows and hello Pulse & Cocktails.

Our Motto As our motto states; we believe that couples who play together, stay together; we therefore suggest couples shop together too! We offer a revolutionary, sexy shopping experience second to none designed for open-minded adults who like to have fun. Our stores are bright, modern, friendly and have the feel of a department store. We are unique in Europe and possibly the world. We have the largest selection of sex toys, lingerie, naughty novelties and erotic books and films in Europe.

Our Customer Services We pride ourselves on offering the highest quality customer services from our excellent, fun and friendly team. Our staff are highly knowledgeable of the extensive products on offer and their affable personas are guaranteed to make you feel comfortable and enjoy your every visit.

Our Promise We guarantee the most exciting sexy shopping experience of your life and once you’ve been you’ll come again and again!

Your Peace of mind We have more square feet of adult retails sales area than any other U.K company. We are the leaders within our field and our reputation is second to none for customer service, product choice and professional advice both in store and online. Why risk buying from anyone else? No other company can make the Pulse & Cocktails Satisfaction and Service Guarantee. Our reputation is your guarantee!
